bill.title: Greyhound Protection Act of 2021
bill.description: To amend the Wire Act to clarify that gambling on commercial greyhound racing and field coursing using wire communication technology is prohibited.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security
